All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • getNumRows

      int getNumRows()
      returns the number of rows in the GameBoard
      Returns:
      the number of rows in the GameBoard as an int

    • getNumColumns

      int getNumColumns()
      returns the number of columns in the GameBoard
      Returns:
      the number of columns in the GameBoard as an int

    • getNumToWin

      int getNumToWin()
      returns the number of tokens in a row needed to win the game
      Returns:
      the number of tokens in a row needed to win the game as an int

    • dropToken

      void dropToken(char p, int c)
      This Method places the character p in column c. The token will be placed in the lowest available row in column c.
      Parameters:
      p - character to use as the token, as a char
      c - column to place the token in, as an int

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      This method returns what is in the GameBoard at position pos If no marker is there, it returns a blank space char.
      Parameters:
      pos - object of row and column, as a BoardPosition type
      Returns:
      Marker found at pos, blank if no marker found

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      This method returns true if the column can accept another token; false otherwise
      Parameters:
      c - number that represents the index of the column, as an int
      Returns:
      True if column is not full, false if column is full

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      This method checks for win of recent marker
      Parameters:
      c - column the latest token was placed in, as an int
      Returns:
      True if win is found, false if win is not found

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      This method checks for gameBoard being full of player markers, results in game tie
      Returns:
      True if a tie is found, false if game can continue

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      This method checks for win of recent marker horizontally
      Parameters:
      pos - object of row and column, as a BoardPosition type
      p - character to use as the token, as a char
      Returns:
      True if win found horizontally, false if no win found

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      This method checks for win of recent marker vertically
      Parameters:
      pos - object of row and column, as a BoardPosition type
      p - character to use as the token, as a char
      Returns:
      True if win found vertically, false if no win found

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      This method checks for win with a specified marker for both left and right diagonal
      Parameters:
      pos - object of row and column, as a BoardPosition type
      p - character to use as the token, as a char
      Returns:
      true if win found diagonally, false if no win found

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      This method locates current player token and returns true if the player is at pos; otherwise, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      pos - object of row and column, as a BoardPosition type
      player - which person is using the token, as a char
      Returns:
      [True if player marker is found at pos, false if no marker found, false if player marker not found]
